title: How to watch The Masters 2022 online and on TV in the UK today

sentence: His response to his employer Matt Fitzpatrick after the Sheffield man wondered whether to go for the green at the 13th made me laugh out loud.
author: DEREK LAWRENSON
title: Seeing Tiger Woods fight through the dying of the light was heroic and Bubba Watson wears the green jacket with pride... but slow players have made themselves unwatchable - Masters hits and misses
